name: Slowking
author: Aya Kusube
flavor_text: When its head was bitten, toxins entered Slowpoke’s head and unlocked an extraordinary power.

abilities.name: Royal Flash
abilities.effect: Once during your turn (before your attack), you may flip a coin. If heads, move an Energy from your opponent’s Active Pokémon to 1 of his or her Benched Pokémon.

attacks.name: Psych Up
attacks.effect: During your next turn, this Pokémon’s Psych Up attack does 40 more damage (before applying Weakness and Resistance).
